bug.author: tobsecret
bug.summary: Bounding boxes drawing cancels when drawing over the edge of an image
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Expected behaviour</denchmark-h>
When drawing a bounding box or other marker over the edge of an image, anything drawn over the edge clips to the edge. <denchmark-h:h1>Observed behaviour</denchmark-h>
When drawing a bounding box over the edge of an image, the drawing cancels. This makes it more difficult to label objects in the periphery of images, which is frequently where they will be in microscopy images.
